ground_truth: A lion's head looks out from a crest formed by a garland of film, Metro-Goldman-Mayer, which features the words. Light flares from a torch held aloft by a robed woman standing on a pedestal in front of a sky dominated by towering clouds. Towering crags rise out of a shining sea. Two powerful cars speed along a tunnel which runs along the coast. A shiny wheel flashes, a driver's eyes are fixed on the road. A gun is caught, the driver checks his rear view mirror. He guns his shiny Aston-Martin past a line of traffic as his pursuers open up. Bullet holes pepper the Aston's windows. The tire on a truck bursts and gets swerved into the Aston's path sliding along the wall as James Bond, the steely-eyed Aston driver brakes hard. He swerves past the truck which pulls out on him. A piece of metal protruding at the front of the truck, punches into the car's door, locking the two vehicles together. Bond brakes hard causing the metal to rip his door open sending the Aston spinning down the road in front of the truck. He regains control and speeds off. The two lanes ahead are blocked. One coming right for him. He locks into a gap. But his pursuers hit the truck head on. Another Alfa Romeo is still in the chase. Approaching a traffic jam he swerves left, flying down another tunnel to chase a track's vision off. The Aston-Martin followed by the black Alfa-Romeo driving towards the quarry. The cops glimpse the cars speed over a bridge. The Land Rover heads off, blue lights flashing. Coming out of the tunnel and rounding a corner, Bond skids the car to avoid the police Land Rover which blocks the road in front of him and heads off through the dusty quarry, the Alfa still on his tail. He swerves past tracked excavators and down a winding bumpy track in front of a smooth new quarry rock face. The cops open fire and get blasted from the Alfa. The Land Rover plows into a building and off the edge of a cliff. Bond calmly changes gear. His eyes widen as the Land Rover bounces across the track right in front of him. The Alfa gunman is leaning out of the car's passenger window. Bond ducks as glass and bullets fill the Aston. The Alfa draws alongside and the two cars trade dusty paintwork. A bulldozer looms in front of them. Both cars swerve round it. Bond draws a machine-gun. The Alfa hurtles off a precipice. Bond drives the dusty battered Aston into a medieval Italian town with stone buildings and narrow streets. A lofty campanile bell tower dominates the huddle of buildings.

test_cases.name: Synonym Substitution
test_cases.description: A lion's visage gazes out from a coat of arms formed by a wreath of cinema, Metro-Goldman-Mayer, which showcases the words. Illumination flares from a flame bearer lifted by a robed lady standing on a base in front of a firmament dominated by towering cumulus. Towering peaks arise out of a gleaming ocean. Two strong vehicles race along a passageway which runs beside the shore. A gleaming wheel flashes, a chauffeur's eyes are fixed on the route. A firearm is caught, the chauffeur checks his rear sight mirror. He accelerates his gleaming Aston-Martin past a queue of automobiles as his chasers open fire. Projectile holes dot the Aston's panes. The tire on a lorry ruptures and gets swerved into the Aston's path sliding along the barrier as James Bond, the steely-eyed Aston motorist brakes hard. He veers past the lorry which pulls out on him. A fragment of alloy jutting at the fore of the lorry, jabs into the vehicle's door, securing the two conveyances together. Bond brakes hard causing the alloy to tear his door open sending the Aston spinning down the route ahead of the lorry. He regains command and hastens away. The two lanes forward are obstructed. One approaching right for him. He locks into a gap. But his chasers collide with the lorry direct on. Another Alfa Romeo is still in the pursuit. Nearing a traffic snarl he swerves left, flying down another passageway to chase a trail's view off. The Aston-Martin followed by the black Alfa-Romeo driving towards the excavation. The policemen glimpse the automobiles race over a span. The Land Rover moves off, azure lights flashing. Emerging from the passageway and rounding a bend, Bond slides the vehicle to elude the constabulary Land Rover which blocks the route ahead of him and moves off through the dusty excavation, the Alfa still on his trail. He veers past tracked diggers and down a winding jolting path in front of a smooth new excavation stone face. The policemen open fire and get blasted from the Alfa. The Land Rover crashes into a structure and off the verge of a cliff. Bond calmly shifts gear. His eyes widen as the Land Rover rebounds across the trail right in front of him. The Alfa gunman is leaning out of the vehicle's passenger window. Bond ducks as glass and bullets fill the Aston. The Alfa draws alongside and the two automobiles trade dusty paintwork. A bulldozer towers in front of them. Both vehicles swerve around it. Bond draws a submachine-gun. The Alfa plunges off an escarpment. Bond drives the dusty battered Aston into a medieval Italian town with stone structures and narrow lanes. A lofty campanile bell tower dominates the cluster of structures.

Coming out of the tunnel and rounding a corner, the car is skidded by Bond to avoid the police Land Rover, which blocks the road in front of him and is headed off through the dusty quarry, the Alfa still on his tail. Tracked excavators are swerved past and a winding bumpy track is driven down in front of a smooth new quarry rock face. The cops fire open and blast from the Alfa. A building is plowed into by the Land Rover and drives off the edge of a cliff. The gear is calmly changed by Bond. His eyes widen as the Land Rover bounces across the track right in front of him. The Alfa gunman leans out of the car's passenger window. Glass and bullets fill the Aston as Bond ducks. The Alfa is drawn alongside and dusty paintwork is traded by the two cars. The dusty battered Aston is driven by Bond into a medieval Italian town with stone buildings and narrow streets. The huddle of buildings is dominated by a lofty campanile bell tower.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: A lion's head emerges from a crest formed by a film garland, Metro-Goldman-Mayer, featuring the words. Light flares from a torch held by a robed woman on a pedestal against a sky with towering clouds. Crags rise from a shining sea. Two powerful cars race through a coastal tunnel. A shiny wheel flashes as a driver focuses on the road. A gun is caught, and the driver checks his mirror. He accelerates his Aston-Martin past traffic as pursuers fire. Bullet holes pepper the Aston's windows. A truck tire bursts, swerving into the Aston's path. James Bond, the driver, brakes hard, swerving past the truck. A metal piece on the truck locks with the car's door. Bond brakes, ripping the door open, sending the Aston spinning. He regains control and speeds off. Two lanes ahead are blocked. He finds a gap, but pursuers hit the truck head-on. Another Alfa Romeo continues the chase. Approaching a traffic jam, Bond swerves left, entering another tunnel. The Aston-Martin, followed by the Alfa-Romeo, heads toward a quarry. Cops see the cars speed over a bridge. A Land Rover with flashing lights follows. Exiting the tunnel, Bond skids to avoid the police Land Rover blocking the road and heads through the quarry, the Alfa still chasing. He swerves past excavators and down a bumpy track. Cops open fire and are blasted by the Alfa. The Land Rover crashes into a building and off a cliff. Bond calmly changes gear as the Land Rover bounces across the track. The Alfa gunman leans out, and Bond ducks as bullets hit the Aston. The Alfa draws alongside, trading paintwork. A bulldozer looms ahead; both cars swerve around it. Bond draws a machine-gun, and the Alfa hurtles off a precipice. Bond drives the battered Aston into a medieval Italian town with stone buildings and narrow streets, dominated by a lofty campanile bell tower.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: A lion's head emerges from a film garland crest, Metro-Goldman-Mayer, with words. Light flares from a torch held by a robed woman on a pedestal against a cloud-filled sky. Crags rise from a shining sea. Two cars speed through a coastal tunnel. A shiny wheel flashes, the driver focuses on the road. A gun is caught, the driver checks the mirror. He accelerates his Aston-Martin past traffic as pursuers fire. Bullets hit the Aston's windows. A truck tire bursts, swerving into the Aston's path. Bond, the driver, brakes hard, swerving past the truck. Metal from the truck locks with the car's door. Bond brakes, ripping the door open, spinning the Aston. He regains control and speeds off. Two lanes are blocked. He finds a gap, but pursuers crash into the truck. Another Alfa Romeo chases. Bond swerves left, entering another tunnel. The Aston and Alfa head to a quarry. Cops see them speed over a bridge. A Land Rover follows with flashing lights. Exiting the tunnel, Bond avoids the police Land Rover blocking the road, heading through the quarry with the Alfa chasing. He swerves past excavators on a bumpy track. Cops fire, the Alfa returns fire. The Land Rover crashes off a cliff. Bond changes gear, eyes widening as the Land Rover bounces in front. The Alfa gunman leans out, Bond ducks from bullets. The Alfa draws alongside, trading paintwork. A bulldozer looms; both cars swerve. Bond draws a machine-gun, the Alfa falls off a precipice. Bond drives the battered Aston into a medieval Italian town with stone buildings and narrow streets, dominated by a campanile bell tower.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description: A majestic lion's head emerges prominently from a crest that is artistically formed by a garland of film, representing the iconic Metro-Goldman-Mayer logo, which proudly features the company's name in bold letters. Light radiates brilliantly from a torch that is held high by a robed woman, who stands gracefully on a pedestal set against a backdrop of a sky filled with towering, dramatic clouds. In the distance, towering crags rise majestically from a shimmering sea, creating a breathtaking scene. Two powerful, sleek cars race at high speed through a tunnel that runs parallel to the scenic coast. A shiny wheel catches the light as a driver's eyes remain intensely focused on the road ahead. A gun is suddenly caught in the action, and the driver quickly checks his rearview mirror. He accelerates his gleaming Aston-Martin past a line of traffic as his relentless pursuers begin to open fire. Bullet holes rapidly pepper the Aston's windows, creating a tense atmosphere. The tire on a nearby truck bursts, causing it to swerve dangerously into the Aston's path, sliding along the wall as James Bond, the steely-eyed driver of the Aston, brakes hard. He skillfully swerves past the truck, which abruptly pulls out in front of him. A piece of metal protruding from the front of the truck punches into the car's door, effectively locking the two vehicles together. Bond brakes hard once more, causing the metal to rip his door open, sending the Aston spinning down the road ahead of the truck. He quickly regains control and speeds off with determination. The two lanes ahead are completely blocked, with one vehicle coming directly towards him. He expertly maneuvers into a narrow gap, but his pursuers collide head-on with the truck. Another Alfa Romeo remains in the chase, persistently pursuing him. As he approaches a traffic jam, he swerves left, flying down another tunnel to chase a track's vision off. The Aston-Martin, followed closely by the black Alfa-Romeo, races towards the quarry. The police catch a glimpse of the speeding cars as they zoom over a bridge. The Land Rover takes off in pursuit, blue lights flashing urgently. Emerging from the tunnel and rounding a sharp corner, Bond skids the car to avoid the police Land Rover, which blocks the road directly in front of him, and heads off through the dusty quarry, with the Alfa still hot on his trail. He skillfully swerves past tracked excavators and navigates down a winding, bumpy track in front of a smooth, new quarry rock face. The cops open fire, only to be blasted by the Alfa. The Land Rover plows into a building and careens off the edge of a cliff. Bond calmly changes gear, his eyes widening as the Land Rover bounces across the track right in front of him. The Alfa gunman leans out of the car's passenger window, and Bond ducks as glass and bullets fill the Aston. The Alfa draws alongside, and the two cars trade dusty paintwork in a fierce exchange. A massive bulldozer looms ahead of them, and both cars swerve around it with precision. Bond draws a machine-gun, and the Alfa hurtles off a precipice. Bond drives the dusty, battered Aston into a medieval Italian town, characterized by its stone buildings and narrow, winding streets. A lofty campanile bell tower dominates the huddle of buildings, adding to the town's historic charm.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
A magnificent lion's head emerges prominently from a crest that has been artistically formed by an elaborate garland of film. This beautifully designed emblem represents the iconic logo of Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, which proudly features the company's name displayed in bold, striking letters. Light shines brilliantly and radiates from a torch held aloft by a robed woman, who stands with grace and poise atop a finely carved pedestal. This entire scene is set against a backdrop of a sky filled with towering and dramatic clouds, creating an awe-inspiring visual. In the far distance, towering crags rise majestically from the surface of a shimmering sea, together crafting a breathtaking and stunning scenic view.

Two powerful and sleek cars zoom forward at incredible speed, racing through a tunnel that runs parallel to the scenic and picturesque coast. The shiny and polished wheel of one car catches the light brilliantly as the driver's eyes remain intensely and focusedly fixed on the road ahead. Suddenly, a gun is caught in the action, and the driver quickly glances at his rearview mirror, checking for any potential threats. He accelerates his gleaming Aston-Martin past a line of slow-moving traffic as his relentless pursuers begin to open fire. Bullet holes rapidly pepper and pierce the Aston's windows, creating a tense and dramatic atmosphere. The tire on a nearby truck bursts unexpectedly, causing it to swerve dangerously into the Aston's path, sliding perilously along the wall as James Bond, the steely-eyed and calm driver of the Aston, brakes hard with precision. He skillfully swerves past the truck, which suddenly pulls out directly in front of him. A protruding piece of metal from the front of the truck punches into the car's door, effectively locking the two vehicles together. Bond slams on the brakes once more, causing the metal to rip his door open, sending the Aston spinning down the road ahead of the truck. He quickly regains control and speeds off with unwavering determination. The two lanes directly ahead are completely blocked, with one vehicle coming directly toward him. He expertly maneuvers into a narrow gap, but his persistent pursuers collide head-on with the truck.

Another fiercely determined Alfa Romeo remains in the chase, persistently tailing him. As he approaches a traffic jam, he swerves left, swiftly flying down another tunnel to chase a track's vision off. The Aston-Martin, closely followed by the relentless black Alfa-Romeo, races towards the quarry at breakneck speed. The police catch a fleeting glimpse of the speeding cars as they zoom over a bridge with remarkable agility. The Land Rover takes off in pursuit, blue lights flashing urgently and insistently. Emerging from the tunnel and rounding a sharp corner, Bond skids the car expertly to avoid the police Land Rover, which is blocking the road directly in front of him, and heads off through the dusty quarry, with the Alfa still hot and relentless on his trail. He skillfully swerves past tracked excavators and navigates down a winding, bumpy track in front of a smooth, newly hewn quarry rock face. The cops open fire, only to be blasted by the determined Alfa. The Land Rover dramatically plows into a building and careens off the edge of a steep cliff.

Bond calmly changes gear, his eyes widening slightly as the Land Rover bounces across the track right in front of him. The gunman in the Alfa leans out of the car's passenger window, and Bond deftly ducks as glass and bullets rain into the Aston. The Alfa draws alongside, and the two cars trade dusty paintwork in a fierce and intense exchange. A massive bulldozer looms ahead of them, and both cars swerve around it with precise skill. Bond draws a machine gun, and the Alfa hurtles off a precipice, tumbling into the abyss below. Bond drives the dusty, battered Aston into a medieval Italian town, characterized by its ancient stone buildings and narrow, winding streets. A lofty campanile bell tower stands tall, dominating the huddle of buildings, adding to the town's historic charm and timeless appeal.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: A lion's head emerges prominently from a crest intricately formed by a garland of film, bearing the name Metro-Goldman-Mayer, with the words elegantly displayed. Light radiates dramatically from a torch held high by a robed woman who stands majestically on a pedestal, set against a backdrop of a sky filled with towering clouds. Towering crags rise dramatically from a glistening sea, creating a breathtaking scene. Two powerful cars accelerate rapidly along a tunnel that runs parallel to the coast, their engines roaring. A shiny wheel catches the light as it spins, while the driver's eyes remain intensely focused on the road ahead. A gun is suddenly caught in the driver's hand, and he quickly checks his rearview mirror for any signs of pursuit. He then accelerates his gleaming Aston-Martin, overtaking a line of traffic with precision as his pursuers begin to open fire. Bullet holes start to appear, peppering the Aston's windows with alarming speed. A tire on a nearby truck bursts, causing the vehicle to swerve dangerously into the Aston's path, sliding along the wall as James Bond, the steely-eyed driver of the Aston, brakes hard to avoid a collision. He skillfully swerves past the truck, which attempts to pull out in front of him. A piece of metal protruding from the front of the truck punches into the car's door, effectively locking the two vehicles together. Bond brakes hard once more, causing the metal to rip his door open and sending the Aston spinning down the road ahead of the truck. Regaining control with remarkable skill, he speeds off into the distance. The two lanes ahead are blocked, with one vehicle coming directly towards him. He expertly maneuvers into a gap, but his pursuers collide head-on with the truck. Another Alfa Romeo remains in the chase, determined to catch up. As Bond approaches a traffic jam, he swerves left, deftly flying down another tunnel to chase a track's vision off. The Aston-Martin, followed closely by the black Alfa-Romeo, races towards the quarry. The police catch a glimpse of the cars speeding over a bridge, prompting a Land Rover to head off in pursuit, blue lights flashing urgently. Emerging from the tunnel and rounding a corner, Bond skids the car to avoid the police Land Rover, which blocks the road in front of him, and he heads off through the dusty quarry, the Alfa still hot on his tail. He navigates past tracked excavators and down a winding, bumpy track in front of a smooth new quarry rock face. The police open fire, only to be blasted by the Alfa. The Land Rover plows into a building and careens off the edge of a cliff. Bond calmly changes gear, his eyes widening as the Land Rover bounces across the track right in front of him. The Alfa gunman leans out of the car's passenger window, taking aim. Bond ducks swiftly as glass and bullets fill the Aston. The Alfa draws alongside, and the two cars trade dusty paintwork in a tense exchange. A bulldozer looms ahead, forcing both cars to swerve around it with precision. Bond draws a machine-gun, ready for action, as the Alfa hurtles off a precipice. Bond then drives the dusty, battered Aston into a medieval Italian town, characterized by its stone buildings and narrow streets. A lofty campanile bell tower stands prominently, dominating the huddle of buildings as Bond navigates through the historic setting.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: A lion's head emerges from a film garland crest, displaying the words Metro-Goldman-Mayer. A robed woman holds a torch aloft on a pedestal against a sky filled with towering clouds. Crags rise from a shining sea as two powerful cars race through a coastal tunnel. The driver of a shiny Aston-Martin, eyes fixed on the road, checks his rearview mirror and accelerates past traffic as his pursuers open fire, peppering the windows with bullet holes. A truck's tire bursts, swerving into the Aston's path, but James Bond brakes hard, swerves past, and a protruding metal piece locks the vehicles together. Bond's braking rips the door open, sending the Aston spinning, but he regains control and speeds off. He navigates through blocked lanes, causing his pursuers to crash into the truck. An Alfa Romeo continues the chase as Bond swerves into another tunnel, heading towards a quarry. The police join the pursuit, but Bond evades them, skidding past a Land Rover and maneuvering through the quarry with the Alfa in pursuit. Amidst gunfire, the Land Rover crashes off a cliff. Bond changes gear calmly, dodging bullets and glass as the Alfa draws alongside. Both cars swerve around a bulldozer, and Bond draws a machine gun, sending the Alfa off a precipice. He then drives the battered Aston into a medieval Italian town, dominated by a lofty campanile bell tower.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: A lion's head looks out from a crest formed by a garland of film, Metro-Goldman-Mayer, a major American media company known for its iconic roaring lion logo, which features the words. Light flares from a torch held aloft by a robed woman standing on a pedestal, reminiscent of the Columbia Pictures logo, in front of a sky dominated by towering clouds. Towering crags, like those found along the Amalfi Coast in Italy, rise out of a shining sea. Two powerful cars speed along a tunnel which runs along the coast. A shiny wheel flashes, a driver's eyes are fixed on the road. A gun is caught, the driver checks his rear view mirror. He guns his shiny Aston-Martin, a British luxury sports car known for its association with the James Bond film series, past a line of traffic as his pursuers open up. Bullet holes pepper the Aston's windows. The tire on a truck bursts and gets swerved into the Aston's path sliding along the wall as James Bond, the steely-eyed Aston driver and fictional British secret agent, brakes hard. He swerves past the truck which pulls out on him. A piece of metal protruding at the front of the truck, punches into the car's door, locking the two vehicles together. Bond brakes hard causing the metal to rip his door open sending the Aston spinning down the road in front of the truck. He regains control and speeds off. The two lanes ahead are blocked. One coming right for him. He locks into a gap. But his pursuers hit the truck head on. Another Alfa Romeo, an Italian car brand known for its stylish design and racing heritage, is still in the chase. Approaching a traffic jam he swerves left, flying down another tunnel to chase a track's vision off. The Aston-Martin followed by the black Alfa-Romeo driving towards the quarry, an often dangerous and rugged mining site. The cops glimpse the cars speed over a bridge. The Land Rover, a brand synonymous with off-road capabilities, heads off, blue lights flashing. Coming out of the tunnel and rounding a corner, Bond skids the car to avoid the police Land Rover which blocks the road in front of him and heads off through the dusty quarry, the Alfa still on his tail. He swerves past tracked excavators, large construction machines used for mining, and down a winding bumpy track in front of a smooth new quarry rock face. The cops open fire and get blasted from the Alfa. The Land Rover plows into a building and off the edge of a cliff. Bond calmly changes gear. His eyes widen as the Land Rover bounces across the track right in front of him. The Alfa gunman, an armed pursuer determined to stop Bond, is leaning out of the car's passenger window. Bond ducks as glass and bullets fill the Aston. The Alfa draws alongside and the two cars trade dusty paintwork. A bulldozer looms in front of them, a formidable obstacle in the narrow space. Both cars swerve round it. Bond draws a machine-gun, an essential tool for his survival as a secret agent. The Alfa hurtles off a precipice. Bond drives the dusty battered Aston into a medieval Italian town with stone buildings and narrow streets. A lofty campanile bell tower, a common feature in Italian towns used for marking time, dominates the huddle of buildings.

Two powerful cars speed along a tunnel which runs along the coast. A shiny wheel flashes a driver's eyes are fixed on the road. A gun is caught. the driver checks his rear view mirror. He guns his shiny AstonMartin past a line of traffic as his pursuers open up. Bullet holes pepper the Aston's windows. The tire on a truck bursts and gets swerved into the Aston's path sliding along the wall as James Bond. the steelyeyed Aston driver brakes hard. He swerves past the truck which pulls out on him. A piece of metal protruding at the front of the truck punches into the car's door locking the two vehicles together. Bond brakes hard causing the metal to rip his door open sending the Aston spinning down the road in front of the truck. He regains control and speeds off. The two lanes ahead are blocked. One coming right for him. He locks into a gap. But his pursuers hit the truck head on. Another Alfa Romeo is still in the chase. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. During a heated political rally in a futuristic city a charismatic leader stokes both hope and dissent. as holographic banners illuminate the night sky and fervent crowds surge with anticipation. In the eerie silence of a postapocalyptic wasteland a hardened survivor scavenges through abandoned ruins haunted by the echoes of a oncethriving civilization now reduced to dust. Beneath the shimmering surface of an underwater kingdom a rebellious mermaid defies ancient traditions to explore forbidden coral reefs and secret caverns brimming with forgotten lore. In the quiet confines of a suburban attic an unassuming teenager stumbles upon a mysterious portal that thrusts him into a surreal world where the very fabric of time and space unravels. On the rugged highlands of Scotland a stoic warrior faces rival clans and ancient curses alike his fierce battle cry resonating across mistcovered moors and turbulent skies. Amid the vibrant chaos of a South American carnival a fearless dancer twirls through streets bursting with color and rhythm each graceful move challenging the rigid boundaries of tradition. During a clandestine meeting in a snowcovered mountain lodge two rival spies exchange cryptic messages hinting at an imminent global conspiracy. their whispered words carried off by the howling wind. Inside a lavish 1920s speakeasy a troubled jazz musician pours his soul into a melancholic melody every note echoing the bittersweet memories of lost love and shattered dreams. In a futuristic space station orbiting a distant planet an intrepid crew confronts bizarre alien phenomena and an enigmatic interstellar threat pushing the limits of human endurance. Amidst the chaos of a raging civil war a compassionate medic races through bombedout streets. his every desperate step a race against time to save lives in the midst of utter devastation. On a sundappled afternoon in a quaint European village an eccentric inventor unveils a groundbreaking contraption that defies conventional physics igniting wonder and skepticism in equal measure. In a bustling marketplace in ancient Persia a cunning street thief navigates labyrinthine alleyways and vibrant bazaars. his calculated every move a daring escape from the everwatchful royal guards. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. Deep in the heart of an enchanted forest a brave knight embarks on a perilous quest to rescue a captive princess facing mythical creatures and treacherous traps with unwavering courage. Approaching a traffic jam he swerves left flying down another tunnel to chase a track's vision off. The AstonMartin followed by the black AlfaRomeo driving towards the quarry. The cops glimpse the cars speed over a bridge. The Land Rover heads off blue lights flashing. Coming out of the tunnel and rounding a corner. Bond skids the car to avoid the police Land Rover which blocks the road in front of him and heads off through the dusty quarry. the Alfa still on his tail. He swerves past tracked excavators and down a winding bumpy track in front of a smooth new quarry rock face. The cops open fire and get blasted from the Alfa. The Land Rover plows into a building and off the edge of a cliff. Bond calmly changes gear. His eyes widen as the Land Rover bounces across the track right in front of him. The Alfa gunman is leaning out of the car's passenger window. Bond ducks as glass and bullets fill the Aston. The Alfa draws alongside and the two cars trade dusty paintwork. A bulldozer looms in front of them. Both cars swerve round it. Bond draws a machinegun. The Alfa hurtles off a precipice. Bond drives the dusty battered Aston into a medieval Italian town with stone buildings and narrow streets. A lofty campanile bell tower dominates the huddle of buildings.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: A rabbit's ear peeks out from a shield formed by a cluster of books, Sunflower-Peabody-Finch, which showcases the letters. Shadows flicker from a lantern carried high by a cloaked man perched on a ladder in front of a horizon crowded by floating balloons. Floating barges drift out of a shimmering lake. Two tiny bikes crawl through an alley which zigzags through the valley. A rusty handle turns, a cyclist's nose is pointed at the trail. A cannon is spotted, the cyclist surveys his side window. He kicks his rusty Schwinn past a row of barrels as his chasers slow down. Pebble marks dot the Schwinn's frame. The wheel on a trailer explodes and veers into the Schwinn's lane scraping along the fence as Sherlock Holmes, the focused Schwinn pilot maneuvers deftly. He dances past the trailer which cuts in front of him. A shard of glass jutting from the side of the trailer, slashes into the bike's seat, tethering the two vehicles side by side. Holmes maneuvers sharply causing the glass to tear his seat apart sending the Schwinn tumbling down the lane in front of the trailer. He regains sequence and crawls out. The two corridors ahead are blocked. One heading straight for him. He rolls into a slot. But his chasers collide with the trailer head on. Another Renault Clio is still on the prowl. Approaching a block of cows he drifts right, soaring through another alley to follow a bird's song away. The Schwinn pursued by the gray Renault-Clio whirling towards the canyon. The cows catch sight of the bikes crawl under an overpass. The camel trots off, red lights fading. Emerging from the alley and hugging a bend, Holmes spins the bike to bypass the camel which stands in the passage before him and trots off over the sandy canyon, the Clio still chasing close. He weaves past grazing llamas and up a twisting rugged path before a jagged old cliff edge. The cows shoot arrows and get scared away by the Clio. The camel trots into a house and over the lip of a gorge. Holmes serenely shifts pedals. His nostrils flare as the camel tumbles across the path right in front of him. The Clio marksman is sticking out of the bike's side hatch. Holmes ducks as pebbles and arrows pierce the Schwinn. The Clio swerves beside and the two bikes swap dusty scuffs. A crane looms over them. Both bikes weave around it. Holmes pulls out a crossbow. The Clio veers off a ledge. Holmes crawls the dusty scratched Schwinn into an ancient Greek village with marble arches and winding alleys. A towering obelisk clock tower overlooks the cluster of arches.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: A lion's head emerges from a crest encircled by a film garland, representing Metro-Goldman-Mayer. A robed woman with a torch stands against a backdrop of towering clouds. Dramatic coastal cliffs frame two speeding cars. James Bond, driving an Aston Martin, navigates a tense chase as his pursuers fire bullets, damaging his car. A truck’s tire bursts, locking with Bond’s car. He skillfully maneuvers out of the chaos, regaining control. The road ahead is blocked, but Bond finds a gap, causing the pursuing cars to crash. An Alfa Romeo continues the chase. Bond evades police blockades and navigates through a quarry. The Alfa fires at Bond, exchanging gunfire. Bond’s Aston and the Alfa race dangerously close until the Alfa falls off a precipice. Bond drives his battered car into a quaint Italian town with narrow streets dominated by a campanile bell tower.
